# Summary  

Input: WECARE-NFE dataset of 1,512 variants x 667 samples (470BC = 233UBC + 237CBC and 197NFE)  
Output: 1,318 variants x 667 samples

- Remove common variants with 0.05 < total_AF < 0.95 (consistent with WES analysis)  
- Low frequency variants (1-5%) are preserved; however, they will be down-weighted by SKAT later

# Check data

```{r start_check}

dim(genotypes.mx)

sum(colnames(genotypes.mx) != rownames(phenotypes.df))
sum(rownames(genotypes.mx) != rownames(variants.df))

```

# Explore AFs

```{r explore_AFs}

hist(variants.df$total_AF, lab=T, ylim=c(0,1500))

# Rare **and low-frequency** variants
sum(variants.df$total_AF <= 0.05) # Rare **and low-frequency** ALTs
sum(variants.df$total_AF >= 0.95) # Rare **and low-frequency** REFs (non-representative reference genome)
sum(variants.df$total_AF > 0.05 & variants.df$total_AF < 0.95 ) # common variants

```

# Exclude common variants

```{r exclude_common_variants}

# Make list of variants
common_variants <- variants.df$total_AF > 0.05 & variants.df$total_AF < 0.95
sum(common_variants)

# Exclude common variants from genotype and variants tables
variants.df <- variants.df[!common_variants,]
genotypes.mx <- genotypes.mx[!common_variants,]

# Check result
hist(variants.df$total_AF, lab=T, ylim=c(0,1500))

# Clean-up
rm(common_variants)

```
